```{python}
import pandas as pd
import statsmodels.api as sm
import seaborn as sns
import re
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt





baseball = pd.read_csv("C:/users/Patri/Downloads/Teams (1).csv")

recent_years = baseball["yearID"].max()

cutoff_year = recent_years - 24 

teams_25 = baseball[baseball["yearID"] >= cutoff_year]

print(recent_years, cutoff_year)


print(teams_25.columns)


winners_25years = ( 
    teams_25.groupby("franchID", as_index = False)["W"]
            .sum()
            .sort_values("W", ascending = False)
)

top10 = winners_25years.head(10)

print(top10)


plt.scatter(top10["franchID"], top10["W"])

plt.show()


```

hr_by_team = teams_25.groupby("franchID")["HR"].sum().reset_index()

## Regression Model 
```{python}

print(teams_25.columns)

model_data = teams_25[["W", "HR", "ERA"]].dropna()

x = model_data[["HR", "ERA"]]

x = sm.add_constant(x)


y = model_data["W"]

ols_model = sm.OLS(y, x).fit()

print (ols_model.summary())
